mapper.select: select sysgp, gpsn, count(hostip) as hipcnt, sum(vxstatus) as runproces from (select sysgp, hostdtl.hgpsn gpsn, hostip from sysname left join hostdtl on sysname.gpsn = hostdtl.hgpsn )d left join (select a.ahostip,a.vxstatus from realtime a,(SELECT ahostip,MAX(checktime) checktime FROM realtime GROUP BY ahostip) c WHERE a.checktime = c.checktime AND a.ahostip = c.ahostip AND a.vxstatus = 1) b on d.hostip = b.ahostip group by sysgp, gpsn

SELECT htl.hostip ahtp,htl.csdeip hcdp,htl.agentvsn hatn,atc.vxstatus avts,atc.cpu acpu,atc.mem amem,atc.syscpu asyscpu,atc.sysmem asysmem,atc.autoctl atcl FROM hostdtl htl LEFT JOIN (SELECT a.* FROM realtime a, (SELECT ahostip,MAX(checktime) checktime FROM realtime GROUP BY ahostip) b WHERE a.checktime = b.checktime AND a.ahostip = b.ahostip) atc ON htl.hostip = atc.ahostip WHERE htl.hgpsn = #{gpsn}
SELECT cpu FROM agentpmfc WHERE ahostip = #{hostip} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 0,#{period}
SELECT mem FROM agentpmfc WHERE ahostip = #{hostip} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 0,#{period}
SELECT hostip FROM hostdtl WHERE hgpsn = #{gpsn}
UPDATE sysname SET cpuValue = #{cpuValue} WHERE gpsn = #{gpsn}
